com.mstudenets.studenetsbananaapp.controller.utils

Class SecurePreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mstudenets.studenetsbananaapp.controller.utils.SecurePreferences

  • public class SecurePreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom implementation of SharedPreferences. Redefines all the methods by including encryption functionality using AES transformation and SHA-256 secret key hash transformation.

    • Nested Class Summary
